cause.description:
everyday i hear about pepole goig arcoss the world to help peps and thats all good, but pepole we need to start helping out are own Home. instead of spending money to help kids that can not eat in africa way that help the kids thatcan not eatin the usa. or stop war we have in are streets. i am just sayyes i good to help out other places.but america needs to fix what wrong with it before we can help out others
1. feed arekids.
2. fix are goverment
3. fix are schools
cause.name: Help USA
